name: WebGL-Music-Vizualisation
description: [boilerplate for three.js](https://github.com/jeromeetienne/threejsboilerplate) is a template to get you started. You download it and modify it until it fits your needs. It is a fast way to start a clean project with [three.js](https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/). It avoids repetitive tasks, following DRY principles. It includes various good practices and compatibilities features. More details [here](http://learningthreejs.com/blog/2011/12/20/boilerplate-for-three-js/).
